briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of BIO-K + CL1285 in Prevention of Antibiotic-associated Diarrhea in Hospitalized Adult Patients
officialTitle: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo Controlled, Multicenter Study of the Efficacy and Safety of BIO-K*+ CL-1285* in the Prevention of Antibiotic-associated Diarrhea in Adult Patients Exposed to Nosocomial Infection.

interventions.name: Lactobacillus acidophilus CL1285 and Lactobacillus casei

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Bio-K + CL1285 versus placebo in the prevention of antibiotic-associated diarrhea in hospitalized adult patients.
